targetLine.text: Great Scott! Your other self will miss the lightning bolt at the clock tower, you won't get back to the future, and we'll have a major paradox!
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: No, Doc, not me. The other me. The one that's up on stage playing Johnny B. Goode.

contextAfter.text: Wait, wait, wait. A paradox? You mean one of those things that can destroy the universe?
Precisely. Marty, you have to stop those guys at all costs, but without being seen by your other self or your parents.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
